author: Paul Blest, Anne Torpey
title: Amazon Workers in New York Have Started Walking Off the Job: 'This Is a Cry for Help'
description: An organizer said he expects Gov. Cuomo to take notice. "The government needs to take a serious look at Amazon.”
content:
Amazon workers at a New York warehouse are walking off the job until the place is thoroughly sanitized, after at least two of their co-workers and possibly more became ill with the coronavirus.
 The walkout began at 12:30 Monday afternoon with at least 50 wo… [+4342 chars]
